2020.name: Mujtaba Murtaza
2020.bio: Mujtaba Murtaza is a full-stack developer with strong front-end development skills. Mujtaba's designs are derived by the current web trends and is passionate in learning latest frameworks and advance in the field of web design and development.

2020.name: Matthew Kruze
2020.bio: Matthew Kruze is a game designer and developer and has been for most of his life. From creating homebrews for TTRPG systems to creating independent game projects, Matthew has been bit by the game-making bug. Some of his favorite video games include Hollow Knight, Night in the Woods and The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt, and some of his favorite tabletop games include Fiasco, Savage Worlds, Mysterium and Root. He wants to thank you so much for having interest in this game he has designed, and thank everyone else on the team for their continued hard work and dedication. Also, science still isn't able to determine what Matthew Kruze is, but are about 80% certain that he is a carbon-based life-form.

2020.name: Lauren "Chai" Lewis
2020.bio: Lauren "Chai" Lewis is a multimedia 2D artist and the independent developer behind the upcoming comic"Spooks!" Her love for storytelling and art can be traced back to early childhood when she would make up her own characters such as the sly elf catcher and the speedy superhero Wonder-Whirl. Lauren plans to go into the animation industry as a storyboard artist while also doing freelance work as a 2D artist and continuing her comic series.

2020.name: Josh Watson
2020.bio: Josh Watson has been programming video games since 2017. He enjoys problem-solving and bringing his imagination to life. Josh hopes to start his own indie company one day.

2020.name: Nicole Selby
2020.bio: Nicole Selby is an independent illustrator, ranging from characters to creatures, and she works primarily in 2D; however, she has also been developing her 3D art skills to take her creations into a 3D realm.

2020.name: Sara Lansdell
2020.bio: Sara Lansdell is a 2D artist with a focus in illustration and concept art. She has a special love for fantasy, science fiction, and plant life, and loves to draw both characters and scenery. Growing up with traditional art mediums like graphite, charcoal, pastel, and ink, she discovered digital art in her senior year of high school, and has loved painting and drawing in Photoshop ever since.

2020.name: Jonathan Zeek
2020.bio: Jonathan Zeek is an application programmer specializing in client side programming. He thoroughly enjoys playing games and has competed in local Heroclix tournaments. Jonathan has grown up playing video games and hopes to one day start his own Indy company.

2020.name: Joel Holland
2020.bio: Joel Holland has aspired to be a game designer for most of his life. From bad variants to Bridge deck games, to sketchbooks full of RPG ideas, to GameMaker mini-projects, to Unreal Engine levels, he has always been fascinated by the process of making games. Joel is a 3D artist and level designer who hopes to one day run his own independent design studio.

2020.name: Drennen Dooms
2020.bio: Drennen Dooms is a graduate Game Designer. His work revolves around gameplay programming for 3D environments, and has a lot of experience in Augmented Reality applications.

2020.name: Brandon Winkler
2020.title: Brandon WinklerÂ  is a game designer, level designer, and project manager. He has two major projects under his belt; Brittle and Hammy Farming, both available on Itch.io for free. Treefrog comes as his third major project and he couldn't be happier to be a part of the team.
